metadata.title: CVE-2023-52661 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/tegra: rgb: Fix missing clk_put() in the error handling paths oftegra_dc_rgb_probe()If clk_get_sys(..., "pll_d2_out0") fails, the clk_get_sys() call must beundone.Add the missing clk_put and a new 'put_pll_d_out0' label in the errorhandling path, and use it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
